characters: Driver of a white sedan, driver of a red truck, driver of a white van, motorcyclist
summary: In this segment, the vehicle is driving on a busy urban road. Initially, a red truck is seen on the left side, followed by a white van on the right side. As the vehicle progresses, a motorcyclist appears from the left side and overtakes the vehicle. Towards the end, the vehicle approaches a roundabout with a white sedan ahead.
actions: The self-driving vehicle maintains a consistent speed while navigating through the urban road. It keeps a safe distance from the vehicles on both sides and adjusts its speed slightly to accommodate the motorcyclist overtaking from the left side.
key_objects: 1) Left side: A red truck, approximately 5 meters away, parked and partially blocking the view. 2) Right side: A white van, approximately 3 meters away, parked and blocking the view. 3) Left side: A motorcyclist, approximately 2 meters away, overtaking the vehicle. 4) Front: A white sedan, approximately 20 meters away, approaching a roundabout.
